name: MixCloud Accessibility Fixes
description: - Adds a proper horizontal scrollbar to the playlist at the bottom of the page, so you can scan through long lists without wearing out your mousewheel or your hand. Phew! - Higher contrast play progress bars mean you can more easily see which mixes have been listened or partially listened. This project has a DeviantArt Page. Please leave feedback or feature requests there if possible.
obsoletion_message:
As of deviantART v6, the message center has been updated and this style is no longer required.

If you want more styles and tweaks for deviantART, you might be interested in trying DeviantTidy, which you get get here: http://fav.me/dr5us9
additional_info:
V2.2.1 - 2023-01-21
Updated selectors to be more robust to future changes.
Increased progress bar contrast slightly.
Progress bar for the currently playing mix will be coloured red, similar to the default style.

V2.1.1 - 2022-10-26
Updated selectors for new CSS classes and removed redundant code for tooltip fixes and playback progress circle (these only appear on individual mix pages now).

V2.1.0 - 2020-10-31
Added a high-contrast fix for the alternate linear play progress indicator (Mixcloud seems to be introducing this in favour of the old ring progress indicator).
Added a quick z-index fix to prevent the Pro User icon appearing over the Add to Playlist popup.

V2.0.0 - 2020-07-12
Updated for new CSS classnames and added high contrast play rings.

V1.1.0 - 2020-02-19
Updated for the new (and ugly) Mixcloud 10 theme.

V1.0.0 - 2018-08-15
Initial release of MixCloud Playlist Horizontal Scrollbar.

This style was previously used for a DeviantArt skin and has been reused for something else, because UserStyles.org doesn't allow us to delete styles.
